site.title: Kelsey Rice | SEO Strategist & Content Leader
site.description: Kelsey Rice - SEO Strategist & Content Leader. Making digital experiences easy to find and better to use. Expert in SEO, content strategy, and cross-functional leadership.
site.keywords: SEO strategist, content strategy, digital marketing, Kelsey Rice, SEO consultant, content leadership

hero.subtitle: SEO Strategist & Content Leader with a passion for bridging editorial excellence with commercial impact.

about.heading: Turning search visibility into real business results
about.leadParagraph: I'm an SEO strategist who believes great content shouldn't be hard to find. With experience spanning healthcare, home improvement, and e-commerce, I specialize in creating content strategies that satisfy both users and search engines.
about.bodyParagraph: My approach combines data-driven insights with editorial excellence. I've led cross-functional teams to launch products in new markets, built content flywheels that generate organic backlinks, and created page types that convert at nearly 19%.

highlights.title: Strategic Leadership
highlights.description: Cross-functional collaboration from ideation to launch

highlights.title: Data-Driven Results
highlights.description: Measurable impact on rankings and conversions

testimonial.quote: Kelsey's ability to bridge the gap between editorial and commercial content is exceptional. The page types she developed are now our highest converters.
testimonial.author: — Product Partner

work.heading: Projects that moved the needle
work.subheading: Deep dives into strategies that delivered measurable results

caseStudies.title: Bridging Editorial and Commercial Content
caseStudies.summary: A pharmacy partner's request for a COVID vaccine hub sparked a new page type that satisfied both transactional and informational intents.
caseStudies.challenge: Create content that serves users seeking information while also driving conversions for commercial products.
caseStudies.approach: Worked with product, design, and engineering to build a new page type with dynamic Rx pricing, on-page content, and related resources.
caseStudies.resultDescription: Now the highest-converting page type apart from product pages.

caseStudies.title: Creating a Backlink Flywheel with Data Journalism
caseStudies.summary: Leveraged original research and data stories to build organic backlinks at scale.
caseStudies.challenge: Build domain authority through high-quality backlinks without relying on outreach-heavy campaigns.
caseStudies.approach: Created data-driven content that journalists and researchers naturally want to cite, establishing a sustainable link-earning engine.
caseStudies.resultDescription: Established a repeatable process for earning editorial links from authoritative publications.

caseStudies.title: Expanding into New Markets via Cross-Functional Leadership
caseStudies.summary: Led the content strategy for launching products in Spanish-speaking markets.
caseStudies.challenge: Enter new markets with localized content that resonates culturally while maintaining SEO best practices.
caseStudies.approach: Coordinated across product, engineering, and localization teams to develop a comprehensive market entry strategy.
caseStudies.resultDescription: Successfully launched in new markets with content that ranks competitively against established local players.

items.title: SEO Strategy

items.title: Content Strategy
items.description: Editorial planning that balances user needs with business goals and search intent.

items.description: Bridging content, product, and engineering to build SEO-optimized features.

items.title: International SEO
items.description: Localization and market expansion strategies for global reach.

resume.name: Kelsey Rice
resume.summary: SEO expert, data-driven content strategist, and trained journalist with an eye for design. Nearly 10 years of experience in SEO with the last six in healthtech. Product-led approach to search strategy, keeping both humans and algorithms in mind. Cross-functional collaborator focused on driving meaningful traffic, building authority, and optimizing user experiences.
geoProjects: Technical SEO for non-JS rendering improved AI referral traffic by 32%
Launched new site directory for GEO experimentation
Leveraged LLMs to scale key takeaways across 1K+ articles

roles.title: Director of SEO
bullets: Built and scaled SingleCare's SEO program over six years, driving a 12x increase in organic revenue
Adapt the search strategy and mentor the team through AI-driven search disruption
Plan the roadmap and content calendar based on performance data, competitive analysis, and business goals

roles.title: Senior SEO Manager
bullets: Drove 25x organic growth in three years

Enhanced UX and trust signals to restore authority in a post-pandemic health category

roles.title: SEO Specialist
bullets: Built an API-driven content system, saving thousands of manual editing hours per year

roles.title: Reviews Editor
bullets: Launched a new business line as the end-to-end owner of the home products affiliate hub
